source:
Each facet of the Crystalline Mean has a list of requested deliveries. Iola of the Facet of Forging will accept items from blacksmiths, armorers, and goldsmiths. The items requested will vary according to your level, and may be crafted by any of the corresponding classes. To begin the crafting process, select Logs from the main menu, followed by Crafting Log. Next, select Crystarium Deliveries from within the requisite crafting discipline, then locate the desired recipe. The esteem gauge will build with each successful delivery. Fill the gauge completely and your esteem level will increase, allowing you to progress through the story.

You may deliver both normal and high-quality items, and you can also submit multiple items simultaneously. High-quality items do not result in a larger increase in esteem, but you will receive greater rewards upon delivery.
target:
ミーン工芸館取引の依頼品リストには、
各科から納品を依頼されたアイテムが表示されます。
「錬鉄科：イオラ」への納品は、
「鍛冶師／甲冑師／彫金師」のクラスで可能です。

また、錬鉄科の依頼品は、
製作に要求されるレベルに達していれば、
「鍛冶師／甲冑師／彫金師」いずれのクラスでも製作できます。
製作手帳：スペシャルレシピの「ストーリー関連」から、
レシピを確認し、
マーケットなど様々な方法で材料を入手してから、
依頼品の製作に挑戦してみましょう。

依頼品を納品すると「貢献度」が少しずつ蓄積していき、
これが最大まで貯まることで、「貢献ランク」が上昇します。
そして、貢献ランクが上昇する際には、
錬鉄科の新たなストーリーを見ることができます。

なお、納品はNQとHQのどちらのアイテムでも可能で、
複数個をまとめて、一度に納めることもできます。
ちなみに、HQアイテムを納品した場合は、
得られる「貢献度」の値こそ変わりませんが、
報酬にはボーナスがつきます。

The items requested will vary according to your level, and may be crafted by any of the corresponding classes. To begin the crafting process, select Logs from the main menu, followed by Crafting Log. Next, select Crystarium Deliveries from within the requisite crafting discipline, then locate the desired recipe. The esteem gauge will build with each successful delivery. Fill the gauge completely and your esteem level will increase, allowing you to progress through the story.

You may deliver both normal and high-quality items, and you can also submit multiple items simultaneously. High-quality items do not result in a larger increase in esteem, but you will receive greater rewards upon delivery.

source:
Each facet of the Crystalline Mean has a list of requested deliveries. Bethric of the Facet of Nourishing will accept items from alchemists and culinarians. The items requested will vary according to your level, and may be crafted by either of the corresponding classes. To begin the crafting process, select Logs from the main menu, followed by Crafting Log. Next, select Crystarium Deliveries from within the requisite crafting discipline, then locate the desired recipe. The esteem gauge will build with each successful delivery. Fill the gauge completely and your esteem level will increase, allowing you to progress through the story.

You may deliver both normal and high-quality items, and you can also submit multiple items simultaneously. High-quality items do not result in a larger increase in esteem, but you will receive greater rewards upon delivery.
